column5: Throwing this out there...   Due to circumstances I am in need of a trained carpenter. Framing experience is a Must! You must be able to cut a roof etc... I am not looking for labour.  Job is located in Toronto.  PM me if you are an experienced framer and looking for work  G
dammm G if I was closer and WANTED to live in the city, I know up here there paying us good money to stay around
nice of you to offer this here G, but the location sucks!  Sinker
